Translation: Queue Mod: Combat effectiveness increases by +0.1% per unique regiment in an army.
Queue Mod: The Battle AI has different personalities weighted by Nation, this significantly impacts their strategy.
Line and Heavy Infantry can fire over Light Infantry, Cavalry can fire over all Infantry, and Artillery using Roundshot can fire over all units.
Master of Command features modding support, which includes accessible script, documentation, Steam Workshop functionality, and active development.
Lanchester’s Laws: Concentrated fire is more effective than spreading attacks across targets.
Lanchester’s Laws: Damaging enemies early reduces their ability to deal damage back to you, leading to a scaling advantage.
Lanchester’s Laws: Destroying a target is more effective than damaging multiple.
Left Shift + Keys 1-9 to Assign Control Groups
Hold Left Control to Select Multiple Units
Hold Tab to See Unit Position Previews
Remember to install the free Holy Roman Empire DLC
